Text: Ein Ort, um verwundete und kontaminierte Biber zu heilen.
Comment: Ideally all uses of the word contaminate/contamination/contaminated and inure/injury/injured should be uniform across the project.
Medbay is a contraction of medical bay

Text: Benutzt Strom und Zücht-Technologie, um Biber zu heilen.
Comment: Breeding should be the same as Building.BreedingPod.DisplayName
A poultice is a natural remedy to treat wounds.
A poultice is a natural remedy to treat wounds.

Text: Dieser Produktionsplan kann nicht erforscht werden; nicht genügend Wissenschaftspunkte.
Comment: Prompt when the player doesn't have enough science points to unlock a recipe.

Text: Bist du sicher, dass du diesen Produktionsplan freischalten möchtest? Es kostet {0} Wissenschaftspunkte.
Comment: {0} stands for amount. Prompt when the  player presses to unlock a recipe. Science Points must be the same as Science.SciencePoints
Shown on a locked recipe's tooltip.
